page.title: 02Childrens feelings of Centre
page.content:
I have been to the Centre twice. I think it's great. We have salad and spagetti bolognese. It's good because we go to Nipstone Rock and Rock Cottage. All the time you are in Sirs command and that is fun for all. I think the Centre is great and the best part is when we get wet and tell jokes in our chalets. Peter got wet the most because he was nearest the flaps for the door used to open when the wind blew. I used to laugh at him and he used to cry. It's brilliant when it rains. I like sleeping it is ace.
David Woodfield.
